def.dt: :a share or portion allotted or granted
:a sum granted as a reimbursement or bounty or for expenses salary includes cost-of-living allowance
:a sum regularly provided for personal or household expenses each child has an allowance
:a fixed or available amount provide an allowance of time for recreation
:a reduction from a list price or stated price a trade-in allowance
:an imposed handicap (as in a horse race)
:an allowed dimensional difference between mating parts of a machine
:a taking into account of mitigating circumstances or contingencies the plan makes no allowance for bad weather
:to put on a fixed allowance (as of food and drink)
:to supply in a fixed or regular quantity
